document.full_text: bubba watson got up and down from a greenside bunker to birdie the last and hold a share of the lead with fellow american webb simpson after saturday's third round of the new orleans classic.
document.title: watson and simpson in tie for new orleans lead
lines_and_colors: bubba watson got up and down from a greenside bunker to birdie the last and hold a share of the lead with fellow american webb simpson after saturday's third round of the new orleans classic.
